title: 20 Perches Land for Sale in Hansagiri Road, Gampaha.
details:
20 Perches Land for Sale at Hansagiri Road, Gampaha one of the best residential are in Gampaha city limit. Just 2 minutes walk to Colombo main road, 1.5 Km to the Miriswatta junction, about 2.5 Km to the Gampaha Town.

ගම්පහ, හංසගිරි පාරෙන් පර්චස් 20 ක අනගි ඉඩමක්. කොළඹ ප්‍රධාන පාරට හා මිරිස්වත්ත හංදියට කි.මී 1.5 යි.

Telephone, Electricity, Well & Tap water and other necessary facilities are available.

Close to all Leading Banks, Super Markets, Church, Temple. Financial Institutions, Government & International Schools, Government & International Hospitals, Leading Super Markets and Good residential area with all conveniences.

Close proximity to religious Indigolla Temple & St. Jude Church.
